class.name: SpineTransformConstraintData
class.description: Stores the setup pose for a transform constraint. See [url]http://esotericsoftware.com/spine-transform-constraints[/url] in the Spine User Guide.

method.name: get_bones
method.description: The bones that will be modified by this transform constraint. Modifying the array has no effect.

method.name: get_mix_rotate
method.description: A percentage (0-1) that controls the mix between the constrained and unconstrained rotation.

method.name: get_mix_scale_x
method.description: A percentage (0-1) that controls the mix between the constrained and unconstrained scale X.

method.name: get_mix_scale_y
method.description: A percentage (0-1) that controls the mix between the constrained and unconstrained scale Y.

method.name: get_mix_shear_y
method.description: A percentage (0-1) that controls the mix between the constrained and unconstrained shear Y.

method.name: get_mix_x
method.description: A percentage (0-1) that controls the mix between the constrained and unconstrained translation X.

method.name: get_mix_y
method.description: A percentage (0-1) that controls the mix between the constrained and unconstrained translation Y.

method.name: get_offset_rotation
method.description: An offset added to the constrained bone rotation.

method.name: get_offset_scale_x
method.description: An offset added to the constrained bone scaleX.

method.name: get_offset_scale_y
method.description: An offset added to the constrained bone scaleY.

method.name: get_offset_shear_y
method.description: An offset added to the constrained bone shearY.

method.name: get_offset_x
method.description: An offset added to the constrained bone X translation.

method.name: get_offset_y
method.description: An offset added to the constrained bone Y translation.

method.name: get_target
method.description: The target bone whose world transform will be copied to the constrained bones.
